_sText:
\English/ 

This card is the latest version bt_arena_first (http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/65491), 
which was the first version of the map was a first test for the concept BT (Battle Titan).

this new version is more playable, and if the card is more beautiful,
 with changes adding or deleting entities.

bt concept: the fact is they are round or is a terrorist against a team fight against terrorism.
the terrorist is alone against all, he won by 170hp opponent,
 and partly against the fight against terrorism wins $ 10,000 by the number of against-terrorism.

So in this map, there is only one possible terrorist! But the CTS can be 32! The terrorist has an M3,
 a Deagle, a knife and a costume ... And terrorists, for each player CT, an extra 170HP,
 and the CTS can buy weapons, and they first $ 10,000 ...

/! \ You need Mani Admin Plugin for orders (ma_give, and so on ...)

ENJOY!

PS: I'm sorry, my English is not perfect ... ^ ^ '
